description: Optimized to emphasize the driving, melodic bassline and the bright, rhythmic off-beat guitar 'skank' and brass/horn sections.

bands.notes: Moderate lift for low-end feel and weight.
Strong boost for foundational bass tone and kick drum depth.
Maximum boost for the melodic, driving 'walking' bassline characteristic of the genre.
Small lift for bass transition, but kept in check to avoid boominess.
Mid-range scoop to clean up the mix, separating the bass from the guitar/vocals.
Strong boost for vocal presence, the attack of the snare, and the clarity of horns.
Maximum boost for the bright, cutting sound of the **off-beat guitar skank/chop** and the core harmonics of the brass section.
Moderate boost for high-hat and cymbal crispness, enhancing the rhythmic drive.
Small lift for overall air and brightness.
